answers.answer: Hi, welcome to the forum, the possibilities of dry mouth with weakness and nausea are Sjögren's syndrome, Amyloidosis, Sarcoidosis, HIV infection and uncontrolled diabetes mellitus. It doesn't look like an allergy.You need to under investigations like blood sugar, HIV ELIZA, chest radiograph to rule out the causes. Oral cavity should be looked for candidiasis which may be eythematous and needs anti-fungal treatment. Drugs like Pilocarpine or Cevimeline, which prevents dry mouth, should only be taken after consultation from physician. Take care and regards.
